summary: "The Office" is an American TV comedy series based on a British show. It aired on NBC from 2005 to 2013, with 9 seasons and 201 episodes. The show follows the daily lives of employees at a fictional paper company in Scranton, Pennsylvania. It was filmed without a studio audience or laugh track to look like a documentary. The original main cast included Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, and John Krasinski. The series received positive reviews, won several awards, but the quality dipped in later seasons after Carell left.
title: The Office (American TV series)
